EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2017-06-13-5.9 Release Webinar.EMAIL-Follow Up Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Attending The Turbonomic 5.9 Release Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, Thank you for attending our Quarterly Partner Town Hall Meeting. We hope you left with some useful takeaways! Please feel free to watch the webinar on demand at your convenience! You can find the recording here <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/community/partner-portal/overview]]>. If you have any questions about the webinar please reach out to your account representative or email partners@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:partners@turbonomic.com]]>.
Best, The Turbonomic Team
